actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an individual tax credit for disaster preparation expenses.

summary.text: Provides an individual tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code for up to $200 of the expenses incurred to prevent damage to a taxpayer's personal residence or to protect the lives of inhabitants of such residence from the effect of an imminent natural disaster.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an individual tax credit for disaster preparation expenses.
